{{content_for_layout}}

template.label: Proof of Delivery

template.content:
Order Quote

Thank you for allowing us the chance to gain your business, etc, etc, etc...

{{order.created_by.first|capitalize}} {{order.created_by.last|capitalize}}
Shipper {% include 'shipper' %}
Billing {% include 'billing' %}
Consignee {% include 'consignee' %}
Description of Charges {% include 'charges' %}
Shipment {% include 'shipment' %} {% include 'items' %}

template.name: TSA_certificate
template.label: TSA Certificate
template.content:
{{corp.name}} is in compliance with its TSA-approved security program and all applicable security directives. {{corp.company.name}} has been assigned the number {{corp.iaccert_number}} by the TSA. The expiration date is {{corp.iaccert_expiration}}. All cargo is from a Known Shipper or an unknown shipper in accordance with TSA requirements or from an entity operating under a TSA-approved or TSA-accepted security program. This certification is (i) made with the understanding that any intentional falsification may be subject to both civil and criminal penalties under 49 CFG 1540.103 and Title 18 USC 1001, and (ii) subject to TSA record-keeping requirements approved by TSA.

{% include 'tsa_form' %}

template.name: TSA_unknown_shipper_declaration
template.label: TSA Unknown Shipper Declaration
template.content:
{{corp.name}} is in compliance with its TSA-approved security program and all applicable security directives. {{corp.name}} has been assigned the number {{corp.iaccert_number}} by the TSA. The expiration date is {{corp.iaccert_expiration}}. This shipment contains cargo originating from an unknown shipper not exempted by TSA. This shipment must be transported on an ALL-CARGO AIRCRAFT ONLY. This certification is (i) made with the understanding that any intentional falsification may be subject to both civil and criminal penalties under 49 CFG 1540.103 and Title 18 USC 1001, and (ii) subject to TSA record-keeping requirements approved by TSA

{% include 'tsa_form' %}

template.name: straight_bill_of_lading
template.label: Straight Bill of Lading
template.content:
Received, subject to the agreement betweent the Carrier and {{corp.name|capitalize}} in effect on the date of shipment. Carrier agrees that {{corp.name|capitalize}} is the payer of the corresponding freight bill. This Bill of Lading is not subject to any tarrifs or classifications except as specially agreed-to in writing by {{corp.name|capitalize}} and Carrier

{% include 'shipper' %} {% include 'billing' %}
{% include 'consignee' %}

Instructions

{% include 'pickup_instructions' %}

{% include 'delivery_instructions' %}

{% include 'items' %}

Shipper Certification:The Shipper certifies that the above named materials are properly classified, described, marked and labeled and are in proper condition for transport according to the applicable regulations of the Department of Transporations.

Shipper's Signature:

x

 Date:

 

 Trailer #

 
Driver Signature:

x

 Date:

 

 Seal #

 

Driver Certfication: Carrier acknowledges receipt of packages in good order, condition and quality unless stated hereon. Carrier certifies emergency response information and required placards were made available and/or carrier has the D.O.T. emergency response guidebook or equivalent in the vehicle.

  • Any problems with order, Please call {{corp.name|capitalize}} at {{corp.head_office.phone1}}
  • Mark with "X" to designate material as defined in Title 49 CFG

template.name: delivery_alert
template.label: Delivery Alert
template.content:
{% include 'shipper' %}
{% include 'consignee' %}
{% include 'routing' %}
{% include 'delivery_agent' %}

Instructions

{% include 'delivery_instructions' %}

{% include 'items' %}
  • Please FAX or call with POD information
  • Please call IMMEDIATELY if paper-work puch is missing. We will send replacement D.R.s on demand. Thank You.
  • All charges for additional services or special deliveries require a unique authorization number for payment. Please call prior to performing a requested service
